alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 11:23AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Eagle County through NOON MDT... At 1123 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Eagle to 14 miles southeast of Gypsum to 10 miles west of Redcliff. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eagle and Minturn. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 145 and 152. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
